column4: Disposal during Trial Stage/Disposal by Court - Cases Pending Trial from the Previous Year (Col.4)
column5: Disposal during Trial Stage/Disposal by Court - Cases Sent Up for Trial during the Year (Col.5)
column6: Disposal during Trial Stage/Disposal by Court - Total Cases for Trial (Col.6)
column7: Disposal during Trial Stage/Disposal by Court - Cases Withdrawn/ Other Wise Disposed off (Col.7)
column8: Disposal during Trial Stage/Disposal by Court - Cases in which Trials were Completed (Col.8)
column9: Disposal during Trial Stage/Disposal by Court - Cases Convicted (Col.9)
column10: Disposal during Trial Stage/Disposal by Court - Cases Acquitted or Discharged (Col.10)
column11: Disposal during Trial Stage/Disposal by Court - Cases Pending Trial at the End of the Year (Col.11)
column12: Disposal during Trial Stage/Disposal by Court - Conviction Rate (Col.12) = (Col.9/Col.8) * 100
column13: Disposal during Trial Stage/Disposal by Court - Pendency Rate (Col.13) = (Col.11/Col.6) * 100
